comment: The Whispering Vine is my favorite places to wine shop! The prices are the best in town and the selection is incredible. I also love the food offerings at the 4th Street location - how cool to be able to order dinner and select a fantastic bottle of wine without the mark up. The knowledge of the staff and their willingness to guide shoppers through their abundant selection makes this a one-of-kind, date night experience. If you haven't been to the Whispering Vine Wine Co., you have been missing out.

name: accounts/104447125096839272944/locations/13762251274808944694/reviews/AbFvOqks-qg0XNTThq9rQr-FajfPCHv03w1TiDolz5brNEMHUZjR2-mxyvldGLpR3T4WDJY4Pu_gnw

comment:
We are always happy when we go to Whispering Vine, and we‚Äôre never disappointed. The food, the drinks (obviously), and the staff are consistently excellent.

They have a great selection of unique, flavorful dishes, and the salt and vinegar tater tots are an absolute staple for us every visit. The charcuterie board is our go-to appetizer‚Äîit‚Äôs loaded with delicious options and always hits the mark.

The staff is incredibly friendly and welcoming, and we really enjoy being able to wander around and choose a bottle (or bottles) of wine to enjoy with dinner. It adds to the overall experience and makes it feel relaxed and personal.

Pricing is very fair for the quality of food, the portion sizes, and the level of service. The wine and alcohol pricing is also very competitive with local shops, and unlike many restaurants, you don‚Äôt pay an inflated premium on wine here.

Overall, I highly recommend Whispering Vine. It‚Äôs a consistently great experience and one of our favorite spots in town.

reviewReply.comment: Thank you, Patrick, for the glowing 5-star review! We're thrilled to hear that every visit to Whispering Vine is a delight for you. We take pride in our excellent staff, fair pricing, and our laid-back, personal atmosphere. We can't wait to have you back for your next wine selection and dining experience!

name: accounts/104447125096839272944/locations/13762251274808944694/reviews/AbFvOqnPRmX7JvaJO0Iaq0XayVI6RDabJRvFduDV_ar3ZAx2G8mlDh_P9jr13Tf-LkjHKTQo9s56iw

comment:
This place truly offers one of the best wine tasting experiences in town, standing out for both quality and atmosphere. The wine selection is thoughtfully curated, featuring a great variety of flavors and styles that cater to both casual wine drinkers and seasoned enthusiasts. Each pour feels intentional, and the staff is knowledgeable and passionate, making the tasting experience engaging, informative, and enjoyable.
What really elevates the experience is their top-notch charcuterie board. Beautifully presented and perfectly balanced, it features high-quality meats, flavorful cheeses, fresh accompaniments, and just the right touches of sweetness and crunch. Every bite pairs effortlessly with the wines, enhancing the flavors and turning the tasting into a complete culinary experience.
Together, the exceptional wine tasting and outstanding charcuterie create an experience that feels both relaxed and refined. It‚Äôs the perfect spot to unwind, socialize, or treat yourself to something special‚Äîdefinitely a must-visit for anyone who appreciates great wine and thoughtfully crafted food. üç∑üßÄ

reviewReply.comment: Dare, Thank you for taking the time to rate and review our 4th Street location. We look forward to your return for more charcuterie and wine!

name: accounts/104447125096839272944/locations/13762251274808944694/reviews/AbFvOqkeQkiP8uhMllQ5RWrKS3CpgYlJptyQ4W97tJ69Z-K30j4pvlQ7271byS2Yyu4qyDD2_DKi

comment:
A nice wine bar , they have some nice bottles for sale as well, glass size is generous glasses are not very big however. Some staff are new others more seasoned . Nice private areas in the cellar . The flights do not change often and contain wines that they want to sell some are not always what I would choose . Wines by the glass as well as by the bottle prices are reasonable. Food menu looked good but we did not try. Close to my location and making it a regular hang out .

Since my last review I have frequently dropped in. Hot food is not served till 4pm, however nice dishes are being served. Wine prices are very reasonable considering Reno prices have sored sky high in the past few years.  The atmosphere is charming an older building formerly known as the glory hole a steak house, with a hint of contemporary flare. Patio is nice in spring through autumn and gets pretty noisy in the evenings as many come from all over. Sunday they are closed sad but true. Try them any other day you will be happy you did if you are looking for a cool wine shop with very friendly and knowledgeable staff.

reviewReply.comment: Arniceous, Thank you for taking the time to check us out and give us a review. We think our 8oz pours are generous, but you can always just grab a bottle, with no corkage fee. Our 9oz flights are rotated weekly at our 4th Street location. We hope you return to try our food menu, the burger and truffle tots are a favorite. Cheers!

name: accounts/104447125096839272944/locations/13762251274808944694/reviews/AbFvOqk4EkFkRtysOhu9f7yFl9reWQSOrF_z8VqPBeTYWK_39mq_CjYF__ea7ACYN__OkpYlSfmj

comment: Lovely place to go peruse wines and spirits, and enjoy some fantastic food.  Excellent selection of wines that are reasonably priced. If you‚Äôre more of a spirit person, they have some interesting bottles to consider. With a full bar, they can accommodate anyone with wine, beer, or cocktails. The portions are on the small side, but the food is oh so delicious. Reservations are highly recommended. It tends to be very loud so request the tall tables by the window for a slightly quieter experience.  During the summer the patio is nice.

reviewReply.comment: Dani, how can we improve our rating with you? We strive to be the best and love knowing how we can improve! f
